pages.title: Small Clue
pages.text: Fading, as a small and weak organism, can only process organic blocks next to it, while also taking a while.

pages.title: Concise Instruction
pages.text: Place organic blocks, like Leaves, Pumpkins or Melons next to it and wait a while. After some time the block will get consumed and replaced with a different looking Variant. Break those converted blocks to get a new Resource.
